content: The team has incorporated some essential concepts from the Authentic Leadership IV: Moral Perspective course in their analysis and proposal, especially in recognizing stakeholders, examining systems, and devising solutions. They have demonstrated an understanding of the intricacies of the financial systems in the target area and created strategies to tackle the challenges related to fostering financial inclusion. Moreover, the team has concentrated on using digital banking and data science to offer innovative financial services to underprivileged populations.
